snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama on Monday declared a slow-moving lava flow from the Pu'u O'o vent of the Kilauea volcano in Hawaii to be a major disaster, the White House said....

headline.print_headline: Obama Declares Hawaiian Lava Flow to Be Major Disaster
headline.main: Obama Declares Hawaiian Lava Flow to Be Major Disaster

lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama on Monday declared a slow-moving lava flow from the Pu'u O'o vent of the Kilauea volcano in Hawaii to be a major disaster, the White House said.
